action.action-desc: Mr. Levin of California (for himself and Ms. Porter) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Labor

form.official-title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to include a full-time job with a veterans service organization as a public service job eligible for public service loan forgiveness.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Veteran Service Equity Act.

section.header: Full-time job with veterans service organization
section.text: Section 455(m)(3)(B) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1087e(m)(3)(B)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in clause (i), by striking or at the end;
in clause (ii), by striking the period and inserting ; or; and
by adding at the end the following:

clause.text: a full-time job with any organization recognized by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs for the representation of veterans under section 5902 of title 38, United States Code.
